description: Complete system overview detailing the psychological evolution engine architecture, component relationships, and high-level data flow between major subsystems
Detailed documentation of core psychological calculation algorithms including personality trait evolution, trauma impact multipliers, and symptom development formulas
Comprehensive documentation of data structures for personality traits, developmental stages, therapy types, and their relationships and constraints
Technical specification of the therapeutic match scoring algorithm, efficacy calculations, and intervention analysis logic
Detailed mapping of data flow between major components including the psychology engine, intervention engine, and supporting frameworks
